name: Courtyard by Marriott DFW Airport North / Irving

reviews.title: It was nice
reviews.text: Nice hotel. I liked the fact that they had 3 newspaper by 5:30am (including WSJ). I had a 7am flight so I took a 5;30 shuttle. They sell icecream in the lobby. I ate at the Restaurant that they have. Semi grill food but had a decent steak and a small salad bar. The room was clean, nice. The TV was on a small side - I haven't see one that small (20inch?). The soap products, some generic brand - nothing recognizible. Nice, clean looking decor. Had a balcony overlooking the pool (too cool to use).

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Dfw Airport North / Irving Hotel
description: The Courtyard Dallas DFW Airport North is two miles from DFW International Airport and minutes from the Gaylord Convention Center, and Texas Stadium. This pet-friendly hotel offers free shuttle service to and from DFW Airport, complimentary parking, free wireless Internet, onsite breakfast and dinner at the Courtyard café, a cocktail lounge, valet dry-cleaning, onsite laundry facilities, and full service business center. Guest rooms feature luxury bedding, a coffee maker, sofa bed, and large work desk.
